ns0:Concept.displayName: Tobacco smoking status for tobacco smoker

ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set is composed of codes or concepts which ask the question of the patient about the frequency of their tobacco use.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to determine the frequency of a patient's tobacco use. The data category used is "Assessment, Performed".),(Inclusion Criteria: This value set includes concepts identifying certain key details of tobacco use/consumption, in this case the frequency of tobacco use.),(Exclusion Criteria: None.)
